hero.title: Hi, I'm Nicolás
hero.skills: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Nest.js, Express.js, Node.js, Docker, Postgress, Mysql and more.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 4 years of experience in Web and Software Development. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies. On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. On the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, GraphQL, REST APIs, Laravel, and Ruby on Rails. For databases, I work with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Additionally, I am skilled in DevOps and tools such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Linux, and AWS. Based in Neuquén, Argentina, I am passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions and am open to remote opportunities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.sub_title: I am here to help you

description.paragraph_1: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 4 years of experience in Web and Software Development. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies. On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. On the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, GraphQL, REST APIs, Laravel, and Ruby on Rails. For databases, I work with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Additionally, I am skilled in DevOps and tools such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Linux, and AWS. Based in Neuquén, Argentina, I am passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions and am open to remote opportunities.
description.paragraph_2: I enjoy learning new technologies and constantly improving my skills. I consider myself proactive, responsible, and committed to my work. I always seek the best way to solve problems and add value to the projects I participate in.
description.paragraph_3: In my free time, I enjoy reading, sports, and cooking. I like to stay updated on the latest trends in technology and software development. I also enjoy sharing my knowledge and learning from other professionals in the field.
description.paragraph_4: Additionally, I have 7 years of international experience in the hospitality sector as a cook and kitchen assistant, having worked in New Zealand, Sweden, Germany, and Australia. This experience has helped me develop adaptability, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work under pressure.
description.paragraph_5: Working in diverse environments has also enhanced my ability to integrate into new cultures, collaborate with multicultural teams, and quickly adapt to different dynamics and work expectations.

footer.description: I am <mark>Nicolás Fernández</mark>, a Fullstack Developer with 4+ years of experience in Web and Software Development. Specializing in <mark>JavaScript</mark>, <mark>TypeScript</mark>, <mark>React.js</mark>, <mark>Next.js</mark>, <mark>Nest.js</mark>, <mark>Express.js</mark>, <mark>Node.js</mark>, <mark>Postgress</mark>, <mark>Mysql</mark> and Devops practices such <mark>Docker</mark> and <mark>Github Actions</mark>. Currently based in Neuquén, Argentina, and open to remote projects. I invite you to learn more about my skills, experience, and professional journey.
